entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,503001}I detect a very dangerous demon nearby.{F801}You should consider getting out of here.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Friendly Hunter\0{F87A,29}{F813,1,403002}Hey there. You're a Hunter, right?{F801}{F802}I'm glad to see you here, because I'm{F801}in the market for some food.{F801}{F802}{F87A,29}{F813,1,403042}Let's see... Do you have any{F801}{F804,5}{F872,1}?{F804,0}{F801}{F802}I'd buy {F804,5}{F872,1}{F804,0} for triple{F801}the market price right now.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Friendly Hunter\0{F87A,29}{F813,1,403041}I can't thank you enough. Here's the{F801}{F804,5}{F878,1} Macca{F804,0} I owe you.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Friendly Hunter\0{F87A,29}{F813,1,403033}I hope you'll be around to help me out{F801}again in a bit.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Friendly Hunter\0{F87A,29}{F813,1,403033}I hope you'll be around to help me out{F801}again in a bit.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Friendly Hunter\0{F87A,29}{F813,1,403042}Oh. Well, that's okay. If you ever{F801}change your mind, you know where{F801}to find me.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Friendly Hunter\0{F87A,29}{F813,1,403042}Oh. Well, that's okay. If you ever{F801}change your mind, you know where{F801}to find me.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Friendly Hunter\0{F87A,29}{F813,1,403042}Hm? You don't have any {F872,1}.{F801}{F802}Oops. Sorry if that was an unreasonable{F801}request.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Friendly Hunter\0{F87A,29}{F813,1,403042}Hm? You don't have any {F872,1}.{F801}{F802}Oops. Sorry if that was an unreasonable{F801}request.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Friendly Hunter\0{F87A,29}{F813,1,403001}I've got plenty of food right now. But{F801}if you come back another time, maybe{F801}we can do business then.{F801}
